name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: A spicy stir-fried dish made with diced chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers in a spicy sauce.

name: Steamed Pork Spare Ribs
description: A Cantonese dish made by steaming pork spare ribs with fermented black beans, ginger, and garlic.

name: Hot and Sour Soup
description: A popular Chinese soup made with tofu, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, and eggs in a spicy and sour broth.

name: Sweet and Sour Pork
description: A classic Chinese dish made with battered and fried pork pieces in a sweet and sour sauce, served over steamed rice.

name: Ma Po Tofu
description: A spicy Sichuan dish made with soft tofu, ground pork, and chili pepper paste in a spicy bean sauce.

name: Ramen
description: A Japanese noodle soup dish made with Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and uses toppings such as sliced pork, dried seaweed, and green onions.

name: Sushi
description: A traditional Japanese dish consisting of cooked vinegared rice combined with other ingredients such as raw fish, vegetables, and egg.

name: Tempura
description: A dish made of seafood, vegetables or mushrooms that have been battered and deep-fried.

name: Udon
description: A type of thick wheat noodle commonly served in a mild broth or stir-fried with vegetables.

name: Donburi
description: A Japanese dish consisting of rice topped with ingredients such as beef, chicken, fish, or vegetables in a sauce.

name: Hamburger
description: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground beef, placed between two buns and usually served with lettuce, tomato, and condiments such as ketchup and mustard.

name: Hot Dog
description: A grilled or steamed sausage sandwich served in a long bun and topped with condiments such as ketchup, mustard, and relish.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. The eggs and cheese are mixed together with cooked spaghetti to create a creamy sauce.

name: Pizza Margherita
description: A type of pizza made with a simple tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil. It is meant to represent the colors of the Italian flag.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: A sour and spicy soup made with shrimp, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, and chili paste.

name: Pad Thai
description: A stir-fried rice noodle dish typically made with eggs, peanuts, and vegetables, and seasoned with a combination of fish sauce, sugar, and vinegar.

name: Roast Beef and Yorkshire Pudding
description: Roast beef served with a large, puffed-up Yorkshire pudding on the side. The beef is typically roasted until it is medium rare and served with gravy.
